mapper.insert: insert into t_drug (id, code, name, common_name, category, specification, place) values (#{id}, #{code}, #{name}, #{commonName}, #{category}, #{specification}, #{place})
mapper.update: update t_drug set code = #{code}, name = #{name}, common_name = #{commonName}, category = #{category}, specification = #{specification}, place = #{place}, status = #{status} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select stock from t_drug where id = #{id}
